overview: Ken Washenik (M.D., Ph.D) serves as the Medical Director of Bosley. He is also the Chief Executive Officer of the Aderans Research Institute, a biotechnology firm involved in researching tissue engineered hair follicle neogenesis and cellular based hair restoration. . He has served as the former director of the Dermatopharmacology Unit at New York University School of Medicine, and he is currently the clinical instructor and faculty member in the Department of Dermatology. Dr. Washenik is a known national and international lecturer, primarily speaking to dealing with the influence of hormones on the skin, and its impact on hair growth and loss. He has published articles in peer-reviewed journals such as, Endocrinology, The Lancet, The New England Journal of Medicine, and The Archives of Dermatology, generally focusing on varied scientific and medical aspects of hair restoration.
